website_summaries.verdict: A large tri-fold vanity mirror that provides excellent lighting and is built solidly, so it will last you for years to come.
pros: 36 LED lights with touch-screen brightness control
cons: The mirror will sometimes tilt out of the position that you set it in

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a birthday gift. It was specifically ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift. It was specifically requested by my granddaughter after many hours of reviewing make-up mirrors. Checked it out when it arrived and may have to buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Katge

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vanity. Easy to use, I took a picture of it next to a water bottle for size comparison. WARNING: IT DOES NOT COME WITH A WALL PIECE (ADAPTOR), so you must purchase that separately.
customer_reviews.author: Myisha B.

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product and no changes are needed
customer_reviews.text: This product was everything my wife wanted. It is a great product and no changes are needed. We have a smallish bathroom, but this mirror works as well as very large mirrors with the space we have to use. I would make no changes.
customer_reviews.author: John Blossom

customer_reviews.title: The mirror can be battery operated or plugged in.
customer_reviews.text: The mirror arrived in well kept packaging and was perfectly as described. I am super happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Leitch

customer_reviews.title: We’ve only had it a week but so far it’s great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter. She uses it to apply her competition makeup for dances. We’ve only had it a week but so far it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The lights are very bright and the size is perfect for me. It makes putting on makeup so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the mirror ! The light is great and it’s a perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this item! Exactly what I wanted and as described. I love the size and the perfect lighting
customer_reviews.author: MIRTHA URBAN

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror overall
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror overall. Do wish it was 3x 2x on the entire side not just the small part but overall very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to replace her other "only 1 month old" make-up mirror. Her other one was round with a magnifying mirtor that poped out the back and stuck to the front mirror with a magnet. The charging port broke on it within the 1st month. Now the best part about this mirror is you can replace the rechargable batteries unlike the old mirror. So even if the charging port breaks on this one all you need to do is use AAA batteries! She loves all the mirrors and the way they are laid out. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: The piece that attaches to the USB power cord on the mirror is flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mirror in April and have used it up to now without any issues. The item was exactly as described and was very useful. I kept it on my vanity plugged into the USB power cord and recently when I was cleaning my vanity I unplugged the cord to move it. Later when I was plugging it back in the receiving piece broke off. Not what I expected expected at six months in.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cho

customer_reviews.title: I love that you can connect with USB or use batteries ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can connect with USB or use batteries for the light feature. Also, the mirror itself is not too big and not too small, so it won't take up too much space on your desk/ vanity. I find the mirror to be great for everyday use. Overall, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect I have limited vanity space and this mirror is the perfect size I love that it has 2 and 3X on the sides. I’m very happy with the lighting too!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklynsgram

customer_reviews.title: I should have believed the warning ratings. All was ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have believed the warning ratings. All was as advertised except that the light only worked for about a week... now just a minute or two after you turn it on, the light dims down to VERY VERY low light. Nothing you can do to brighten it back up. Sometimes it starts out bright but it never lasts more than a minute or so. Extremely frustrating because I threw away the box, thinking the product was as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Arcara

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: I have a zero rating for this mirror. Should get NO STARS! First of all it is top heavy. I had to glue nonslip rubber to the bottom of the product to slide it back an forward (which I should not have done). Second the light is so harsh you cannot see your hair even though you can reduce the intensity of the glare. Because I glued the bottom with nonslip I can’t return it. I threw away $20.00! It is good when the power is out. That’s all! IN MY OPINION I WOULD NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap, skip it.
customer_reviews.text: Pedro's makeup feen daughter here. This is genuinely one of the worst products I've ever purchased. I paid $30 for this piece of junk and not even a year later does the light only glow to night-light bright, but also twitches like we're in a club. Even if I wanted to just use it in my bathroom and have my bathroom light for my close up mirror, I'd have to do it sitting on the ground because the mirror refuses to stand upright, it won't hold a position. Save yourself and find a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Low profile mirror without annoying cord
customer_reviews.text: I like this mirror. Much smaller profile than the one I had previously and no wires!! Not bulky, but still large enough to see all my wrinkles and sagging skin! The side mirrors fold in so it's quite compact and doesn't take up a whole lotta room. I'm still getting used to the multiple mirrors but so far, I'm liking it. It's also quite convenient that it comes with a "charger" - just like my iPhone. So far, so good. I would recommend..
customer_reviews.author: TrixieFink

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: The lighting in my room isn't great, so I bought this mirror to use when I apply my make up. It does its job well enough. I put batteries in to use it, however I find that it drained my battery quickly -either that or i grabbed an older batter...i'm not sure. Right now, I just plug my usb cord into it when I need the light. The light itself is very bright and you can dim it down. I don't even need to turn on other lights in my room because this mirror's light it bright enough. The mirror is pretty sturdy and stays in place when I angle it in different positions.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Apparently cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this mirror but it already broke. I’ve had it a week or so and something inside where you plug it in fell inside so I can’t plug it in anymore
customer_reviews.author: Olivia D

customer_reviews.title: Just not bright enough for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: This mirror arrived quickly and worked well, but it was not as bright as I had hoped from the reviews. I needed it to provide almost all the light to put on makeup and this wasn't enough. I ended up going with a vintage GE plugged mirror. The other perhaps minor detail - the highest magnification was on the lower small mirror which made it very awkward for putting on mascara, one of the main reasons for the purchase. Others might not find that a problem but in the area I was to be using it, it was not usable.
customer_reviews.author: CMarks

customer_reviews.title: Super annoying!!!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is absolutely horrible. I only gave it 2 stars because it is very bright but it dims without me touching it, and turns off and on without me touching it. It has to be plugged in when using it at all times or it won’t be at the brightest light which is super annoying! What are the batteries for if it needs to be plugged in? I love how bright it is but it’s very annoying to deal with turning on and off when I’m hurrying to do my makeup. Won’t be repurchasing or recommending this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Still

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It was affordable and I haven’t had any problems with it as of yet. I like the zoom in mirrors in it to help me get all the hairs from my unibrow lol good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Brittnasty

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and lights do not last!
customer_reviews.text: I used this mirror for a makeshift makeup vanity area. I like the size of it but didn’t care for the fact that you either have to use batteries for the light or a usb plug. The batteries do not light up bright enough for me but fortunately my laptop was in the same area so I plugged the mirror in there. The lights still weren’t the brightest but they worked enough for daily makeup applications. I’m reviewing it now after 7 months of use because I went to use the mirror today and it will no longer light up. Very disappointed in this product. I would not recommend this mirror for anyone! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: Terribly dim lights, good quality mirrors.
customer_reviews.text: Welp. I have to say I'm pretty disappointed in the lights. The light is so dim even on its highest setting. This makes doing your make up pretty difficult if you don't have other very bright lights around you. I am however very surprised by the quality of the mirrors. They are very clear and crisp like a high quality mirror. Deciding on sending it back or not.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Outdated, no recharging features.
customer_reviews.text: Really wish the brightness was adjustable and more brighter. The mirror itself requires AAA batteries or a direct USB connection. You'd think it would be rechargeable, but sadly it isn't. At least you can plug it into a portable usb charger pack and get away with it to some degree. I think the design could of been better. The mirrors are nice and get the job done. Overall it is decent and semi light weight.
customer_reviews.author: SierraTheWolfe

customer_reviews.title: Runs through batteries quickly- poor lighting on side mirrors-
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mirror for a month and have already gone through 4 packs of batteries ($14.00 dollars). I found myself finding excuses not to turn it on because I was scared to wear down the battery. When plugging it into the USB, it never even charged- the mirror did not light up even after a significant charge. The little side mirrors do not have lighting all around them- so the lighting is dimmer / harder to see what you are doing on the side mirrors. Not a fan at all! So disappointed. I’m going back to my Conair plug-in mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Not overally large to where it takes up too much space. Can fit in a suitcase nicely for travel. It takes 4 AAA or can be plugged in with usb. It has a touch sensor for the light. Bought it for my daughters vanity and she loves it. The light is very very bright as well. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Walker

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: Cons : It’s fine for what it is. The swivel part doesn’t always stay up and I can’t fighting it to stay. I will have to put it on a box of books to make it a better height. It’s not very travel friendly. Pros. It is very bright, worked during a power outage. Has a mini shelf underneath. Mirrors were clean. Packing was fantastic with no damage during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Brown

customer_reviews.title: First impression
customer_reviews.text: I like the mirror it is right for the price cheaper than other places, good height for my table and its bright. There is a light malfunction when dimming the light, it flickers until it's on the highest setting. I cant think of a reason why I need to dim the light when applying makup so no big deal, and the power cord is about 12 inches shorter than a charger cord so I'm happy about the battery option. ***update the light only flickers if its plugged in when it has batteries the light dims seamlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Keyauna J

customer_reviews.title: Very small, neck not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than i thought but it looks cute on my vanity. The lights are not very bright and only on center mirror. Does not come with adapter, just a very short cord. Should be longer with adapter. Overall its ok.
customer_reviews.author: The true review gal!

customer_reviews.title: It’s good...
customer_reviews.text: The design is simple and sleek... looks good. But what I will say is that it works better when plugged in as opposed to using batteries... It generally takes me about 45min to do my full face of make up and within those 45min the lights had already started to dim when using them with batteries (brand new ones I purchased when I ordered the mirror). So for your vanity, if it’s able to be plugged in at all times when being used, works great! Not so much for travelling...
customer_reviews.author: Liyah Ally

customer_reviews.title: Love it- great for applying
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror! I get ready early every morning when it's very dark. I prefer putting my makeup on with plenty of sunlight so I can see that I'm blending my makeup well enough. This mirror definitely takes the guesswork out of applying makeup in the morning! I can see exactly what I'm doing and even when I examine later in the sun, it's flawless. My son who's one loves the mirror too. He turns the light on and off 😆
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but was advertised and ordered at a ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, but was advertised and ordered at a cheaper price. When received I noticed price was almost double what was advertised and coupon was not given like shown at time of order.
customer_reviews.author: Dmf

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My Husband bought this for me for Christmas. The lighting is nice and bright (if you’re using batteries instead of plugging it in, just be prepared to replace the batteries offer). I like the different mirrors on the sides, too. I use this quite often for my makeup and I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Weber

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Love this new mirror...still getting used to it from previous type. Would be great for traveling as it is light weight...for daily use would prefer heavier base and better usb location as the cord comes down in the front and blocks tray (see picture).
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great price and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this new yesterday and tried it out. It comes with a cord one side micro mini and the other USB (think phone charging cables). No AAA batteries included. It did NOT come with the part that goes into the wall but that could be because different countries have different wall outlets. Over all great product, bright light works well with the wall outlet if you dont have batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Blinky

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mirror. It’s super easy to use, you just have to change the batteries like once a month if you use it every day like I do!
customer_reviews.author: F_as_in_FRANK

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We bough this for our granddaughter for Christmas. She dances competitively, and she wanted something like this so we could apply makeup without having to crowd a bathroom mirror with other dancers. When closed, the item is slim. The light is very bright, so no issues with seeing how to properly apply makeup for style hair. Plus it is battery operated. It does have a power cord, but it is pretty short.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: We are delighted with the vanity mirror
customer_reviews.text: We are delighted with the vanity mirror. It fits compactly into a suitcase for travel. The clear, fine quality mirror and the smaller magnifying mirrors provide excellent images for applying earrings. The adjustable l.c.d. lights illumine everything nicely. The compact design and stable base make it real find at such an affordable price, and we have already purchased another one for our grand daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It falls over at some angles, isn't small enough for travel, and isn't very bright. Also the magnifying sections aren't big enough to really easily see what you need to. Plus it takes 4 AAA batteries and they don't last long. Now that I'm writing this I've decided to change my review from 2 to 1 star. There's really nothing I like about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. She loves it! It has a power cord but also has a slot for 4 x AAA batteries so she can take it on the go or out of the bathroom if someone else needs in. The power cord isn't very long but again because of the battery operation that isn't an issue. The amount of light emitted is perfect for makeup she says. It's not harsh but is good no matter what amount of light surrounds you. There is a x2 and a x3 magnification on one side that is a bit awkward but easy enough to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: M. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: When this mirror arrived, I loved the way it functioned and the lighting was so nice. It is light weight and portable. Although, I have to give it just 1 star because less than 3 months after it arrived, the charging port came loose inside the mirror and now my mirror cannot be plugged in to charge. This means I have to use the battery powered option or my mirror wouldn't light up at all. And honestly, the lights just dont shine as brightly using the battery function.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not really.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this mirror until the piece broke for me to be able to plug it into the wall for full lighting power. I travled with it with ease, but now I can’t even use it because putting batteries in it doesn’t give you the same amount of lighting power as plugging it into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror. Good clarity. Dimmable feature is a plus. Good size and lightweight for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent, not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I use the batteries and USB charger. After 5 minutes of use, the light slowly dims until there’s really no point in using it any more. The white is VERY easily stained and nothing (bleach, alcohol, soaps) can remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: This mirror was perfect for what i needed
customer_reviews.text: This mirror was perfect for what i needed! The LED light strip is a bit much in my face. I didn't think i would use it all that much, but after seeing it with the light on, you have to have it on. I love how i can fold up the mirror and put it away. I love how i can just plug it into a usb port. I love the different magnifying mirrors on it as well. Very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: I like this mirror. It looks nice, is bright, was affordable and has worked consistently. I had bought and sent back two or three other similar makeup mirrors before this one that didnt work or weren’t at all bright. I’ve been using this for about two months now with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Shirk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have a love hate relationship with this mirror, lol. Its amazing, don't get me wrong. However, when I do my makeup I can literally see every imperfection. My makeup game has never been stronger. If my skin doesn't look good with certain products this mirror loudly points it out! Anyway, great mirror, very bright not too big so it doesn't take up too much space, the perfect size for what I need. Comes with cord only, I keep mine plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Charity Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Illuminates optimally only when plugged in....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend. She enjoys it, however it needs to be plugged in to be the illuminating brightness that actually helps her see what she’s doing. Unplugged- its a dim light... she got tired of having to readjust the usb so she does her makeup when she gets to work...
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It's bright and has the different magnifications, which is great. All in all it's a great product. I wouldn't recommend the white because it gets dirty easily but I just use it at home so it hasn't bothered me at all. I do wish the cord that came with it was longer. I switched it out with one I had and was good to go. I would def recommend this mirror to anyone who has low lighting issues. I plan on buying another one for my mom because she loves mine.
customer_reviews.author: JoHanna Kemper

customer_reviews.title: Not bright enough
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mirror because I really wanted a nice bright light that would make colors look true to what they were like a natural lighting. The lighting I didnt feel was bright enough, and definitely didn't give a nice clear light. I didnt like that it was unadjustable either. I ended up returning this mirror. The only upside to it I felt was that it had a USB cord instead of solely relying on batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Terrific little mirror
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and portable, with very bright dimmable LED lights and two magnifying mirrors. Main mirror is a good size and the unit swivels to provide several viewing angles. Lights are battery-powered or may be powered via the included USB cable. Unfortunately, there is no electrical adapter included, but the cable is compatible with any USB adapter for cell phone or other electronic device.
customer_reviews.author: wyczguy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to my sister and she loves it. Fantastic mirror for the price. I only have one complaint and it’s a small one- the cord is pretty short so you have to be pretty close to an outlet to plug it in. Only a small inconvenience though. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany T

customer_reviews.title: My teen loves it for her cosplay
customer_reviews.text: My teen put this in her wishlist for her cosplay makeup needs. The lights are super bright and helpful. It fits right on her bathroom counter. The side mirrors are great additions for different views. She is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Allicadabra

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: I just got back from a out of town trip and my package was here, i was so excited when opening but it came broken. I’m really upset but I don’t have the time to return it so I’ll take my loss. Last time I’ll be purchasing anything breakable lol
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Morris

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Mirror suddenly dimmed, is plugged into the wall so it's not a low battery. It's junk now. Great mirror. Lighting is great in my dark room. There stand is a little iffy, I'm scared it will crack if adjusted too much.
customer_reviews.author: kittyhawk8568

customer_reviews.title: bright and light
customer_reviews.text: It's made of plastic, so will see how it holds up. It folds pretty flat for travel, but you have to remove the stand and carry it along with the mirror. It is light weight and the lights are very bright. this was a gift for my granddaughter, and she seems very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Batt

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Needs more lights . 3 top n bottom of the main pane, and then the two smaller panes need at least two lights at the top and bottom as well. This mirror will function fine for travelling, but it's not the best for those with poor eyesight and who need more light in order to find eyebrow pieces that need plucked.
customer_reviews.author: Tams

customer_reviews.title: Needs more light
customer_reviews.text: The light is only in the middle. Its not bright at all and def not bright enough to light up the side mirrors that are x2 and x3.
customer_reviews.author: Pugmomma

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of it..compact, doesn’t need to be plugged in, has magnifying. But the lighting is awful! Uses batteries and not very strong light with new batteries. The magnifying parts are not lit either.
customer_reviews.author: sheshana n mahmood

customer_reviews.title: Great vanity mirror for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this vanity mirror. When folded, it is slim and does not take up much space on my vanity table. The only complaint I have is that the batteries only keep the lights bright for a couple of days then dim a significant amount making it hard to really see my makeup application. However, if you keep it plugged in, the lights continue to remain bright. I also wish the magnification mirror were larger than it is. Other than that, this is a great vanity mirror for the price and I would purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is what you expect for this price. Lights are extremely bright but the battery option is only feasible for travel. Is will devour some batteries. My teen daughters love theirs. 1
customer_reviews.author: negburn7

customer_reviews.title: Ok...not very bright.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that was brighter and I still need to get close which is the issue I wanted to improve upon. However, I kept it because it packs well for hotels and is an improvement on their light.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. I bought it for mother's day and she use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: It was amazing for the first 3 weeks I had it then ...
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing for the first 3 weeks I had it then the charging socket popped out and so it would only run off battery’s which makes it not run as bright my advice is if you get it it’s nice but I wouldn’t unplug the mirror a lot if at all it breaks super easy
customer_reviews.author: Seairra Miller

customer_reviews.title: Honest Reviewer
customer_reviews.text: I can never guage sizes even when I know 12in equals a foot lol. So I thought this would be a little bigger. Tbh though it's so bright and lightweight that its perfect! The USB charging is definitely a plus! (Objects for size perspective!)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Thacker

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a fair review because I didn't feel I was getting what was shown. The lighting features were to low light and using the other magnifications were so low, I had to hold it up to my face to actually see if there was any difference at all, there wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: DeWeezle

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Im loving my new mirror! I didnt expect the light to be so bright. There aren’t any distortions and it really helps me see clearly in the morning when I’m doing my makeup. The only thing I had to buy for it was a long usb cable so that I could connect it to an outlet close to my vanity. So far no complaints except for the faint red light at the bottom that doesnt turn off when the mirror is plugged in, but it isn't really visible when the mirror is closed.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Andretta

customer_reviews.title: Great for teens but doesn't come with power cord
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 12-year-old granddaughter, who is just starting to experiment with makeup techniques. She loves it and feels that the magnification and lighting are perfectly adequate for applying makeup. The only drawback is that it requires a USB plug or batteries; there is no plug-in electrical cord.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Morehouse

customer_reviews.title: The lightimg, the magnification, and the size is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, it's not so big that it takes up so much room on your vanity. I love the various magnifications. They really help when you are putting on eyeliner and mascara. The lighting is great and you can control it, that is another plus. All in all its a great buy for the money. I am very happy with my product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Light burns out quickly with minimal use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in July 2020, and the light has already gone out. I don’t even use it every day, mostly just on sunday when i actually leave the house for church. Now it’s too late to return it, so I’m stuck with it. Very disappointing. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S Trager

customer_reviews.title: Panels left and right don't provide the amount of visibility that I would like. Also the light is pretty weak
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it was going to be. Panels left and right don't provide the amount of visibility that I would like. Also the light is pretty weak. It gets the job done for now but wouldn't necessarily recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: EJM

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with this purchase - works well for my needs - i don't travel so I can't comment on the traveling/sturdiness of the item - just on the whole - works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Regina T Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great in the beginning
customer_reviews.text: Little disappointed... I loved this mirror when I first got it. Brightness was just right. I put a fresh pack of new batteries in and it’s only been 3 weeks using it and the light is not as bright as before...? Seems as if the bulb is dying out, sometimes it doesn’t even work.. I always turn it off when i’m not using it so I’m not sure what is killing it so fast? Really wanted to love this mirror but now it’s just basic
customer_reviews.author: Alvannette M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror! It is super bright and you have the option to dim the brightness if it's too bright, it's adjustable, and you can use a regular micro USB cord to power it. The only thing I regret is not getting a case to keep it in.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: So Far, Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Mother's day present for my wife and she absolutely loves it! Its bright and the mirrors are great. She did say she wished both magnifying mirrors were on top, but it's a minor quibble. She set it up and tried it out right away when she got it. Very happy. Went with this one, had one of the higher ratings
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.text: It’s nice but the whole putting in a cord at the bottom didn’t help at all it ruined my nice android cords (I have a apple stuff so having a android cord is very rare)
customer_reviews.author: Jay Causey

customer_reviews.title: It works for what I need it for
customer_reviews.text: This mirror I use everyday. It’s not very bright with batteries but with the usb cable it’s way better so I just keep it plugged in. The tilt on it gets a little loose from moving it but it’s easily fixed with a screw driver.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the time!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 as a Christmas gift and they loved them so i got myself 1 and I’m thrilled. I would recommend to everyone. A great gift. Light weight and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DBTA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for college!
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror for the price. Not overly large so Perfect for a dorm room setting where space is limited. Burns through triple A batteries rather quickly but with the added usb plug batteries aren’t really nessesary. An added plus is that it’s actually brighter when you plug it in!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price !
customer_reviews.text: I've looked at other mirrors which were very expensive , and this mirror beats them all ! I so glad I didn't listen to some of the other reviews ! It's a nice mirror for the price , very bright ! I use it with the USB cord it came with , and I don't move it from my vanity ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, though needs a break
customer_reviews.text: Great compact mirror that you can break down for travel. I use it for performances. If you aren't plugging it in, it takes 4 AAA batteries. My only complaint is that when it's running off three battery, the light starts to dim. Will go back up to full brightness if it rests a little while. Not sure if it's the battery or the LED lights. Haven't tried it with USB yet.
customer_reviews.author: Lynzsea Sky Williams

customer_reviews.title: Attractive & Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I love the Vanity Mirror. I have used it constantly since receiving ti. The lighting is excellent. The magnifying just perfect for my needs. It stores easily in my Vanity and I will be able to take it with me when I travel later this year. It's the perfect size to easily pack
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror for daughter
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t easy to travel which my daughter needs. This is sturdy enough to make the trips back and forth on her competitions. It is bright although the cord is very short. It made it difficult for her to use. Overall love it. If it was permanently in her room I would probably look into something else.
customer_reviews.author: jenna shaffer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is nicely compact and gives high-clarity reflections from all the panels; the two magnifying mirrors on the left are a great feature. For close-up work I supplement the built-in light with a lamp or with daylight on a sunny day.
customer_reviews.author: Portia Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted and then some! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Of course I read reviews before buying and there were many good reviews. I love the mirror, it's very powerful, great quality and I love how you can adjust the brightness. It's also a wonderful size for traveling. I carry a large purse and if needed, I can throw it in my purse and use it in battery mode! Great product, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is cheaply made, but it’s honestly not the worst thing ever. I’m going to keep it but had I felt it in a store or something I wouldn’t have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: MWright

customer_reviews.title: Good Prouct, Amazon needs better delivery people
customer_reviews.text: Its a great light, it works well! Its super bright and great makeup lighting. The reason I gave it 4 stars is because my amazon said it was “handed directly to a resident” and it was on my neighbor’s front porch right before it started pouring raining. I was not to happy that the box could’ve been rained on and was not “handed directly to a resident”
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Like how the lights are bright enough to see everything on your face, how it’s touchscreen and I use it for applying my makeup or facial masks, it folds to fit traveling bag when traveling
customer_reviews.author: Olvera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised at how nice of a product this is! Was delivered very quickly. Well packaged and protected. Quality item especially at this price! Ordering more of these for my daughters!
customer_reviews.author: Just a Sassy Mom in Arkansas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! I just absolutely love it! It's bright and portable so I can take it anywhere. I've caught my husband using it to shave lol
customer_reviews.author: Gissela Escobedo

customer_reviews.title: Wish the light was brighter
customer_reviews.text: My only wish is that the light was brighter. I find myself wishing it was brighter when I’m plucking my eyebrows..etc.... Other than that it’s perfect. The magnification, perfect size & easy to travel with, battery operated and the actual mirrors in it is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Herman

customer_reviews.title: very very disappointed with this
customer_reviews.text: It worked the first time I plugged it in...once I plugged it in the second and third time, the lights would not go on...very very disappointed with this, I am sad that I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is very dark even when it is lit up. It is cheap. I had ordered My daughter a more expensive one I wish i would have just paid the extra money and got the same 1 for me hers was amazing
customer_reviews.author: Fiona M Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect makeup mirror
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for what I needed. Love that it has the different sizes and it is adjustable. I like that you have the option to either plug it in or use batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: The magnification level could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't happy with the level of zoom on these mirrors.The best one was the small one in the bottom right corner. I would like to return it but it looks like I'm out of the time window, and the bottom piece will NOT click off to fit back into the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall I am happy with this purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy with this purchase for the price. One note is that initially the light is very bright around he center mirror then it dims dramatically. I have to turn it off and back on after a few mins to get the bright light again. The mirrors are nice and clear and I like that there are different mirror options and a place to sit make up etc.
customer_reviews.author: Todja Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror!
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I wanted! I love the led light around the main mirror. It can light up either with 4 AAA batteries or by plugging in the USB cable to your computer. Instead I plug the USB to my android phone chargers adapter and plug it into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Aliyah

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright, but options for dimming
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is sleek in design and is so very bright. It replaced my old Revlon make up mirror from the 70's (not kidding). I love the dimmer option and the magnification on the side mirrors is helpful for plucking problem areas. All in all, it's a great product. It has options to plug it in or use batteries.
customer_reviews.author: fashiongal

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product for the price. It's very bright and can be dimmed. I don't like how it has to be plugged in all the time for it to be working. Light does not last long with batteries. Overall still great lighted mirror!
customer_reviews.author: May Y.

1X/2X/3X MAGNIFICATION MIRROR: The BeautyWorks lighted makeup mirror features 2 additional levels of magnification for perfect tweezing, blackhead removal and detailed eye makeup application.

USE AT HOME OR ON THE GO: With its lightweight, portable design and dual power supply, your Beautyworks mirror can be used anytime, anywhere. Plug in the USB at your vanity table or power with AAA batteries and look your best on the go!

180-DEGREE ROTATION: Adjust your BeautyWorks mirror to your perfect position thanks to its rotating swivel design. The base of the mirror also acts as a handy little storage compartment for jewelry and other small accessories.
